name: Valhalla: A Viking's Beard
blurb: A comedic, action packed side scrolling platformer, that tells the tale of Erik, a viking who embarks on a quest to regain his beard!

rewards.reward: Thanks for your support. Every bit helps!
EARLY BIRD - \r\nYou got here first so you get a special price! In this pack you will receive the Valhalla: A Viking's Beard game and access to the early beta as well as our developer forums!
PLAYER PACK - \r\nYou get a digital copy of the Valhalla: A Viking's Beard game, and access to the early beta as well as our developer forums!

DIGITAL PACK - \r\nYou get a digital copy of the soundtracks from both games, a digital art book and a bag of gold coins (worth $5) for in app purchases in the Valhalla: A Viking's Battlefield store! Also includes all items on the board for this tier.

BATTLE PACK - \r\nYou get an all exclusive backers weapon and companion for Valhalla: A Viking's Battlefield. You will also receive a chest full of gold (worth $20) for in app purchases in the Valhalla: A Viking's Battlefield store. Also includes all items on the board for this tier.
SQUIRE PACK - \r\nIn Valhalla: A Viking's Beard, you will have the squire at your side! He will be there to carry extra gear on your epic journey. Also includes all items on the board for this tier.
ARTISAN PACK - \r\nYou will get an autographed physical copy of the art book and an original signed picture from the artist! Also includes all items on the board for this tier.

OUYA PACK - \r\nFor those who want to enjoy this game on the big screen, then the OUYA pack is for you! You willl get an OUYA gaming console and access to hundreds of other titles on the OUYA market. Also includes all items on the board for this tier.

PRISONER PACK - \r\nYou will become one of the prisoners in the game! Erik will be able to free you and collect a reward. You will also be featured in the credits! Also includes all items on the board for this tier.

MANAGERS PACK / SHOPKEEPERS - \r\nYour likeness as one of the 8 Shopkeepers in the game! Where does everyone get their goods? ...from you!  And yes, because you're in the game, your lovely face and and name will be a featured spot in the credits too!  You'll also get a printed commission of your character, with a personal thank you note for your awesome sponsorship! Includes all items on the board for this tier.

MANAGERS PACK / JARL - \r\nYou become one of the eight Jarls! These guys run the eight cities, and you're of 'em!  Because you're in the game, you and your face will have a spot in the credits too!  You'll also get a printed commission of your character, with a personal thank you note for being so supportive! Includes all items on the board for this tier.

HERO PACK - \r\nYou will create one of six playable characters in Valhalla: A Viking's Battlefield! These are online multiplayer characters that people around the world will be able to experience. We will work with you to create a fighting style and a unique ability for your character. You will also get a printed autographed commission of your character, personalized with a thank you message. Also includes all items on the board for this tier.

TITAN PACK - \r\nYou will help us to create one of four Titan's that are optional boss battles for Valhalla: A Viking's Beard. The Titans are guardians of the realm and will have some epic item drops if others manage to defeat your creation. You will also receive a printed autographed commission of your titan with a personalized thank you message. Also includes all items on the board for this tier.

THE MERCHANT - You are THE traveling merchant. You are seen throughout both games. You are a last resort before boss bottles, there to help players stock up. You carry the rarest items from your travels. You are always a welcome sight. You will receive a printed autographed commission of your one of kind merchant with a personalized thank you. Also includes all items on the board for this tier.

Wow, you are one seriously committed viking! You get to work with us and make your own hero, with their own story, powers, etc. Your hero is just like Erik, and can be played by anyone who plays Valhalla: A Viking's Beard!
